name: More Accurate Speed Portals
description: Tweaks the speed of the player on each speed portal to be EVEN MORE EXACTLY as the portals themselves mislead you into thinking they are.

speed-adjustment-0.5x.name: 0.5x Speed
speed-adjustment-0.5x.description: Adjusts the speed of the 0.5x portal.

speed-adjustment-1x.name: 1x Speed
speed-adjustment-1x.description: Adjusts the speed of the 1x portal.

speed-adjustment-2x.name: 2x Speed
speed-adjustment-2x.description: Adjusts the speed of the 2x portal.

speed-adjustment-3x.name: 3x Speed
speed-adjustment-3x.description: Adjusts the speed of the 3x portal.

speed-adjustment-4x.name: 4x Speed
speed-adjustment-4x.description: Adjusts the speed of the 4x portal.
